instructions.test_instructions: ONLY THE PERSON WHOSE NAME APPEARS
instructions.red_codes: Please print name/address corrections for all family members on label.

address_change.question: Does the change apply to all family members or just to you?
address_change.if_changed: Please include new phone number and area code.

instructions.directions: Please read the directions for each part and fill out the ballot completely.

cigarettes.return_instructions: Return it to me in the enclosed envelope.
cigarettes.phrases: Read the phrases at each end of each line of boxes. Which phrase do you think describes the cigarette better?
cigarettes.marking_instructions: If the one on the left describes it better, mark an X in one of the boxes on the left side. If the phrase on the right side of the boxes is a better description, mark one of the boxes on the right side. The more you think the description is true, the closer to the respective side.

instructions.aftertaste: Leaves a good aftertaste in my mouth
